thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: David Russell
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 David Russell

author: David Russell
title: David Russell
text: I purchased a Raspberry Pi with heat sink, fan and case. Out of about 50 purchases, this is the only one purchased with the additional "insurance", so I'm not sure if it was the insurance or good customer service that got me a replacement.The Pi itself was smashed on one corner. Banggood replace the entire order. Yes, it took a month, but, that's okay. I bought 3 more in the meantime, and started using Arduino microcontrollers instead. It's nice to know that Banggood takes care of these things. Thank you Banggood.
